item.title: My three first ever siggys!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:46, topic:157385”]J00 G0t KoED was your first name?[/quote]It was one of my first successful pures on Runescape. I had the name on a Runescape forum, so I made the signature for it. Difference between mine and his though, I followed a tutorial. But I went through tons of tutorials before posting stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: My three first ever siggys!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I tried to follow zilchuary’ sig tutorial, but I couldn’t understand what he was saying, due to all of the incorrect spelling, and grammar. So I don’t think mine came out very good. (Understand, this is a joke. I even saved it as a .bmp lol. That sig took me a whopping 1 minute to make [I had to open PhotoShop and download a render.)

item.title: My three first ever siggys!
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Zilchuary, this is a graphics section, if you’re a fucking legend at Java, it still wouldn’t matter, graphics is a totally different thing, and you are acting like a cunt.

But, my first sig i posted, i posted with bad grammar, and i did a render, clouds, and text, but i didn’t get this? I got good CnC off Mr.Chris. I then, started using brushes and so on, until i got OK.

Yes, these sigs are shite, but you could atleast give some CnC.

item.title: My three first ever siggys!

item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

EDIT

[quote=“Exception, post:24, topic:157385”]Erm, just to give you something else to flame him about, his code he posted wouldn’t even work. You must declare the type of the variable ‘i’, which should be ‘int’.

for (int i = 1; i < 6; i++) { System.out.println(i); } [/quote]
ur cleaver arnt you
mostly everyone knows that but still not my point.

item.title: My three first ever siggys!
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“hey321, post:14, topic:157385”][quote author=eVokki` link=topic=214599.msg1872402#msg1872402 date=1194400081]

How about you all shut the fuck up? It’s sad to see people fighting over the fact that he isn’t good at making sigs, or the he can take other peoples stuff, modify it, and call it his own, perhaps you should all piss off, leave him alone, and give credit where its due? Now. I think all three are pretty good for firsts, but you could change stuff around and make em so much better, so I’m gonna put a 5/10 on all of them.

And Exe, your just a fag, perhaps he did get hacked today, if he did, bam, your making fun of him for that, just PROVING your a fag. Btw, I believe him, maybe if you weren’t such a fag I wouldn’t. Fuck off and leave the man alone.

You have got to be shitting me ? Someone downloads photoshop, fills the background, puts random text on it and a render then you give them a 5 out of 10 ? Are you a total retarded fuck or are you fucking blind.
[/quote]

I am neither, I believe you are both you fucking retard. They are his FIRSTS. They are GOOD for firsts. Gtfo.[/quote]
THOSE ARE CRAP FOR HIS FIRSTS!
My first was way better, and to back me up, look at EVERYBODY ELSE’S FIRST SIG.
Don’t get me started in this, I can do this all day long.
Even mine was better than his green background with crappy text.

I am just stating the fact that these sigs suck, and listen to exe626’s god damn tips, as I try to.

Read full topic
